column4: Hello, I am new to IRC and Ubuntu honestly.  I have some questions about using XDMPC
how can i increase performance on my LAN? Does the client PC speed play a roll?
depends on what you are doing exactly. copying files alot? then client and server CPU speed, harddisk speed, network connection and how you connect it all (switch, router etc) got its role
your question is a bit too general.
